article_title: Blue Cross Plans To Launch Private Exchange For Retirees

article_metadata.description: In the latest endorsement of the fast-growing private exchange approach to health benefit offerings, Blue Cross and Blue Shield companies will launch an online portal for retirees to shop for different plans. The Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association, which represents Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans across the country said [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
